UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.
The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: In Silico and In Vitro Structure-Activity Relationship of Mastoparan and Its Analogs.
Literature.Author: Rungsa P, Peigneur S, Jangpromma N, Klaynongsruang S, Tytgat J, Daduang S

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=25µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=50µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(MIC=25µg/ml),Escherichia coli O157:H7(MIC=50µg/ml),Escherichia coli DH5alpha(MIC=3.125µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 27736(MIC=25µg/ml)
